content.rendered:
Directed by Sharat Katariya

Written by Sharat Katariya

Cast Anushka Sharma (Mamta). Varun Dhawan (Mauji). Raghuvir Yadav (Mauji’s Father). Natasha Azad (Jury #1). Shrikant Verma (Palte Ram). Sidharth Bhardwaj (Bansal). Ashish Verma (Prashant). Namit Das (Guddu). Siddharth Bhardwaj (Bansal (as Siddharth Bharadwaj)). Yamini Das (Mauji’s Mother). Bhupesh Singh (Naushad). Jeetu Shastri (Cobbler (as Jeetendra Shastri)). Lokesh Mittal (Panditji). Puja Sarup (Harleen Bedi (as Pooja Swaroop)). Priyanka Arya (Volunteer).Govind Pandey. Komal Chhabria (Jury #3). Sikander Malik (Examiner). Manukriti Pahwa (Kumud). Sawan Tank (Jugnu). Aditya Sharma (Official #1). Praveen Mahuwale (Official #3). Abha Parmar (Yogesh’s Mother). Mahesh Sharma (Yogesh). Anirban Bhattacharyya (Ranvir Tandon / Judge 4). Vaibhav Rajoriya (Compounder). Neha Singh (Sweety). Pradeep Nema (Bus Conductor). Nirmala J. Chandra (Mehendi Girl #2). Ayush Sharma (Sanju). Gourvi Batule (Prashant’s Bride). Babita Khan (Naushad’s Wife). Jp Mishra (Old Man). Ankita Gosai (Receptionist). Sam (Peon). Parigi (Jury #5). Dev Kotwal (Blood Bank Boy). Animesh (Cashier). Radha Khandelwal (Shakuntala). Komal Singh (Mehendi Girl #1). Mangatram (Factory Supervisor). Ridith Chouske (Beenu).Shraddha Joshi. Avinash Kunte (Peon 1).Tariq Khan. Vaibhav Rajoriya (Compounder (as Vaibhav)). Alok Gutch (Official #2). Brijesh Karanwal (Bijender). Shankar Lal (Band Master). Geetanjali (Mem Sahab). Anshul Tilethe (Official Lady). Swati (Bijender’s Wife). Kalpana (Palteram’s Wife). Syed Ali Arif (Jury #2). Jagdish (Doctor). Latha Nayak (Malayali Nurse). Ashish Verma (Prashant)

Language Hindi

Producers Aditya Chopra. Bharat Rawail. Ravi Sarin. Rajat Kanti Sarkar. Maneesh Sharma. Aashish Singh

Production Yash Raj Film
